sub_fields.label: New Elements Shortcut Bar
sub_fields.name: bc_structure_panel_shortcut
sub_fields.instructions: New Element Shortcut Bar At Structure Panel

sub_fields.label: Expand/Collapse All Childrens
sub_fields.name: bc_expand_collapse_children
sub_fields.instructions: Expand/Collapse all children of current active element at Structure Panel Action Shortcut Bar

sub_fields.label: Show/Hide Elements
sub_fields.name: bc_show_hide_elements
sub_fields.instructions: Apply Global Class 'bc-hide-in-canvas to Element to hide Element in Canvas. Apply Global Class 'bc-hide-in-frontend to Element to stop render in frontend but sill editable in Builder.

sub_fields.label: Preview Global Class & Variables
sub_fields.name: bc_preview_class_variables
sub_fields.instructions: Preview Global Class and Css Variables on hover

sub_fields.label: Compact Element Categories
sub_fields.name: bc_slim_left_panel
sub_fields.instructions: Streamlined Element Categories and added an Expand/Collapse toggle for all Element Category groups

sub_fields.label: Query Manager
sub_fields.name: bc_query_manager
sub_fields.instructions: Manage Elements query settings. Save Element query settings to Query Manager, Select query settings from Query Manager and apply to Element. Edit and update query setting in Query Manager update all Elements with same query id across entire site.

sub_fields.label: Preloader Background Color
sub_fields.name: bc_preloader_background
sub_fields.instructions: Change Builder preloader background color.

sub_fields.label: Saved Message
sub_fields.name: bc_save_message
sub_fields.instructions: Replace Builder save message. Each message separate with new line.

sub_fields.label: Disable Elements - Template Header
sub_fields.name: bc_disable_elements_header
sub_fields.instructions: Disable Elements on Template Header

sub_fields.label: Disable Elements - Template Content
sub_fields.name: bc_disable_elements_content
sub_fields.instructions: Disable Elements on Template Popup/Section/Single/Archive/Error/Search.

sub_fields.label: Disable Elements - Template Footer
sub_fields.name: bc_disable_elements_footer
sub_fields.instructions: Disable Elements on Template Footer

sub_fields.label: Custom Fields Template Conditions
sub_fields.name: bc_acf_template_conditions
sub_fields.instructions: Additional Custom Field Condition Check in Template Conditions: Allows multiple Header, Footer, Archive, or Single templates to be applied to the same post type, while the active template controlled by specific Custom Field values.

sub_fields.label: User Ip Address
sub_fields.name: bc_user_ip
sub_fields.instructions: {bc_user_ip}

sub_fields.label: User Last Login
sub_fields.name: bc_user_last_login
sub_fields.instructions: {bc_user_last_login}, {bc_user_last_login:30} argument for human_time_diff format

sub_fields.label: User Registered Date
sub_fields.name: bc_user_register_date
sub_fields.instructions: {bc_user_register_date}

sub_fields.label: Post Type Taxonomies Terms
sub_fields.name: bc_post_type_taxonomy_terms
sub_fields.instructions: Return Term Id and Name for Checkbox/Radio Options. Accept 2 arguments, post_type_slug and taxonomy_slug {bc_post_type_taxonomy_terms:post_type_slug:taxonomy_slug}

sub_fields.label: Core Framework Integration
sub_fields.name: bc_core_integration
sub_fields.instructions: Integrate Core Framework Free into Builder. All Core Framework Classes, Variables and Color Palette are available in Builder and equipped with preview on hover.

sub_fields.label: Dark Mode Toggle
sub_fields.name: bc_core_theme_toggle
sub_fields.instructions: Core Framework Light/Dark Mode Toggle In Builder. Preview In Canvas.

sub_fields.label: Auto Import Variables (planned)
sub_fields.name: bc_auto_import_variables
sub_fields.instructions: Upload your stylesheet, let Brickscodes auto import Css Variables and Classes.

sub_fields.label: 3D Model Viewer
sub_fields.name: bc_model_viewer
sub_fields.instructions: Support glb/gltf format model

sub_fields.label: Copy to Clipboard Button
sub_fields.name: bc_copy_clipboard
sub_fields.instructions: Copy static/dynamic text content, copy Element Json in Frontend and paste as usual in Builder, export Template Json in Frontend, copy text content by element class/id.

sub_fields.label: View Form Submission in Frontend
sub_fields.name: bc_form_submission
sub_fields.instructions: Query Form Submission and View in Frontend. Exclude any selected form field from query. User role control.

sub_fields.label: WS Form Styler (planned)
sub_fields.name: bc_wsform_styler
sub_fields.instructions: Render and style WS Form in Builder.

sub_fields.label: Slider Nested
sub_fields.name: bc_slider_nested_plus
sub_fields.instructions: Splide features such as Url Hash Navigation, Auto Scroll, Intersection, Sync Sliders. Extra Fraction/Number Pagination, Autoplay Progress Bar, Slides Progress Bar, Play/Pause Button, etc...

sub_fields.label: Form (planned)
sub_fields.name: bc_form_plus
sub_fields.instructions: Frontend Update User Meta(ACF), Frontend Create Post(ACF), Custom user Registration with ACF Fields, Email Validation Before Account Created, Password Match Validation, Password Minimum Requirement Validation, Password Reveal/Hide Icon Toggle, Honeypot Validation, Email Domain Blacklist Validation, More Flatpickr Controls, Webhooks Support HTTP Method POST/GET; Post Data as FormData/Json/Query String, Signature Pad, File Upload Preview, Form Submit Confirmation, Form Retain Data After Submission, Form Abandonment, Textarea Field MaxLength, Textarea as Tinymce in Frontend

sub_fields.label: Webhook HMAC Secret Key
sub_fields.name: bc_webhook_hmac_secret_key
sub_fields.instructions: Use to generate webhook HMAC

sub_fields.label: Email Validation Activation Link Secret Key
sub_fields.name: bc_email_validation_secret_key
sub_fields.instructions: Use to generate verification link for email address

sub_fields.label: Current User Media Access Control
sub_fields.name: bc_media_access_control
sub_fields.instructions: Ensures that users can only view, edit, and delete their own uploaded media files, not those uploaded by others.

sub_fields.name: bc_info_options
sub_fields.default_value: This plugin comes bundled with ACF Free for creating and managing Brickscodes settings. If ACF or ACF Pro is detected, the plugin will automatically use your existing version.

sub_fields.name: bc_info_core_framework
sub_fields.default_value: When enabled, Brickscodes will automatically sync with Core Framework Free. It will import all plain Core Framework classes into the Builder, and all available variables will be presented in a separate modal for easy selection.

sub_fields.name: bc_info_uninstall
sub_fields.default_value:
Query Manager: All Elements query set by Query Manager will continue to work and handled by Bricks. 

Core Framework Integration: If you choose "proceed and delete all", all Core Framework Classes and Variables will be deleted. If you choose "proceed and keep", all Core Framework Classes and Variables will still be available in the Builder, but they will no longer automatically sync with Core. Follow instruction on deactivation.

The rest will revert back to as Bricks default.

sub_fields.name: bc_info_reference
sub_fields.default_value:
Bricks: https://academy.bricksbuilder.io/collection/developer/

Splide: https://splidejs.com/guides/extension/

ACF Free: https://www.advancedcustomfields.com/resources/

Core Framework: https://docs.coreframework.com/development/coreframework-helper

Model Viewer: https://modelviewer.dev/docs/index.html

DataTables: https://datatables.net/manual/

WS Form: https://wsform.com/knowledgebase_category/styling-css/

Current User Media Access Control: https://gist.github.com/Qubadi/07e71872af75d96f8f811306295dafee
